bioAsHtml:
Wolfram Rittmeyer is a passionate Android-Developer and loves to share his knowledge. He has been writing articles about Android, is blogging on his blog Grokking Android, shares on Google+ and Twitter and talks about Android topics on devfests, user groups and conferences. Apart from Android he also has more than 15 years of experience with Java and JavaEE.

You can find him on Twitter (@RittmeyerW), Google+ (+WolframRittmeyer) and github (writtmeyer). He blogs on Grokking Android.
bio:
Wolfram Rittmeyer is a passionate Android-Developer and loves to share his knowledge. He has been writing articles about Android, is blogging on his blog Grokking Android, shares on Google+ and Twitter and talks about Android topics on devfests, user groups and conferences. Apart from Android he also has more than 15 years of experience with Java and JavaEE.

You can find him on Twitter (@RittmeyerW), Google+ (+WolframRittmeyer) and github (writtmeyer). He blogs on Grokking Android.
